title: November 6, 2077
body: I found a friend among my enemies. I don't know how but a chicken found it's way inside. I think I will call him Mr. Jenkins. He is a really good listener and doesn't like the others. He tells me to forget about those chicken-eaters upstairs and stay down with the turbines - with him. I think I will live down with the turbines - no one wants me around anyways.
